short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bringing Community Notes from Twitter to every website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With UniversalNotes, you can view important context about misleading websites or websites that need more context, as well scam or spam sites. 

You'll be able to view notes added to pages by other users, and also add them yourself.

We're an open-source, non-profit browser extension working to fight misinformation on the internet, get the extension and help our goal!
